trans-unit.source: It’s heuristic based and as any algorithm of such a nature it make errors sometime (see Accuracy section below for details).
trans-unit.target: 它是基于启发式的，并且任何这种性质的算法都会在某些时候出错（有关详细信息，请参见下面的“准确性”部分）。

trans-unit.source: Simple tool to compare almost similar names which are coming from the same source (for example list of all company owners and officers of that company). Helps to cluster together persons with a slight difference in name spelling/typos. Better suited for Cyrillic names, but should work everywhere.
trans-unit.target: 比较来自相同来源的几乎相似名称的简单工具（例如，所有公司所有者和该公司高管的列表）。帮助将姓名拼写/错别字略有不同的人聚集在一起。更适合西里尔字母的名称，但应该可以在任何地方使用。

trans-unit.source: Simple tool to compare almost similar names which are coming from the same source (for example list of all company owners and officers of that company). Helps to cluster together persons with a slight difference in name spelling/typos. Better suited for Cyrillic names, but should work everywhere
trans-unit.target: 简单的工具,比较来自同一来源的几乎相似的名字(例如,该公司的所有公司所有者和官员的名单)。有助于将姓名拼写/字型略有不同的人聚在一起。更适合西里尔语名字,但应该适用于所有地方。

trans-unit.source: You can also run it with debug flag to see all the errors algorithm made:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以用debug标志运行它来查看所有算法的错误。

trans-unit.source: You can test your installation on a ground truth data and check confusion matrix by running:
trans-unit.target: 您可以在地面真实数据上测试您的安装,并通过运行检查混淆矩阵。
